name: RPCalander
author: Taako
description: Comprehensive roleplay calendar system with automatic daily updates, accurate moon phase tracking, and special blood moon events. Perfect for D&D campaigns and fantasy roleplay servers.
install_msg: Thank you for installing RPCalander! Use `[p]rpca setstart <month> <day> <year>` to configure your RP timeline, then `[p]rpca setchannel` to set up daily updates. Enable moon phases with `[p]rpca moonconfig enable`.
short: Advanced RP calendar with daily updates, moon phases, and blood moon events.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores local data in the form of a `post_tracker.json` file to track the last post timestamp. No end user data is persistently stored or shared.
